amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate regarding the arrests of Cuban democracy activists by the Cuban Government.

vote.text: Amendment SA 525 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 525 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S4914; text: CR S4914) To express the sense of the Senate regarding the arrests of Cuban democracy activists by the Cuban Government.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 525 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Nelson FL.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 525 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
